item.title: Cold Case Solved After DNA Technology Was Discovered
item.description: Advances in DNA technology bring long-awaited answers in a cold case that had remained unsolved for years.

item.title: Disappeared After a Phone Call: Troy Cook's Case
item.description: A look into the mysterious disappearance of Troy Cook, who vanished following a phone call, with authorities continuing the investigation.

item.title: Was She Abducted? Nicole Anderson's Case
item.description: An overview of Nicole Anderson’s disappearance, exploring the circumstances and ongoing questions surrounding her case.

item.title: She Went MISSING & Was Found 43 Years Later
item.description: A missing person case concludes decades later as a woman is finally located, bringing answers to a long-unsolved mystery.

item.title: Wilma June Nissen went missing in 1978 and left as a Jane Doe for decades. Her daughter, Krissi, spent years searching for her, only to discover she was a victim of a brutal unsolved killing. Now, Krissi fights for justice, pushing police to test DNA and solve the case. Despite roadblocks, she won’t give up on her mom.
item.description: Krissi Nissen searches for answers decades after her mother, Wilma June, went missing. DNA testing and renewed investigations aim to solve the long-unsolved case.

item.title: What Really Happened to Shannon Hercutt?
item.description: A closer look at the circumstances surrounding Shannon Hercutt’s disappearance and the ongoing questions about what happened.

item.title: Was All Of THIS Madness Over Debt?
item.description: A look at a situation where a financial disagreement spiraled, highlighting how conflicts over debt can have serious consequences.

item.title: A family of three, John Gerrish, Ellen Chung, their 1-year-old daughter, Miju, and their dog, went hiking in California’s Sierra National Forest and were later found dead on the trail. #truestories #murder #truecrime #fblifestyle
item.description: Investigators are examining the circumstances surrounding the deaths of a family and their dog during a hike in the Sierra National Forest.

item.title: He Was SURE He Wouldn't Get Caught
item.description: The story of a man who thought he wouldn’t be caught, illustrating how evidence and investigation revealed the truth.

item.title: Was This The 'Perfect' Heist?
item.description: Investigators revisit a daring heist, exploring how it was carried out and whether it truly earned the title of being a “perfect” crime.

item.title: Richard Allen, a 50-year-old man from Delphi with no prior criminal record, was arrested in 2022 for the 2017 murders of Abby and Libby. Police believe he acted alone, but details about the evidence are still sealed. #truecrime #truestories #murder #fblifestyle
item.description: In 2022, Richard Allen was arrested for the 2017 Delphi murders of Abby and Libby. Police believe he acted alone, though case details remain sealed.

item.title: She Will Always Regret Her Decision
item.description: A woman faces lasting consequences from a significant choice, highlighting the personal impact and the lessons learned from difficult decisions.

item.description: Learn practical advice from experts on how to protect yourself and stay safe, with guidance on recognizing, preventing, and responding to stalking situations

item.title: A Daughter’s Fight to Solve Her Mother’s Case
item.description: After her mother’s case went unsolved, a determined daughter works to uncover the truth and help authorities bring clarity to the investigation

item.description: Nicole Anderson, a 56-year-old cancer survivor, went missing from her Minnesota home in July 2024, leaving behind her phone and personal belongings.

item.title: Was It Nature’s Wrath? The Hiking Family Tragedy
item.description: A family’s hiking trip ends in disaster, prompting questions about whether natural forces played a role in the tragic events.
